Name: Linkeballen: Demarrage Expansion
Description:
With this extension you get 2 extra teams of three riders.
This makes it possible to play the game to 6 players.
Have you been the expansion teams, you can play with 8 players.

In between equally sprinting away from the competition?
With breakaway capabilities of this expansion have the words tactics and strategy really meaning.
You need the basic game for this expansion.

48 Demarrage cards
24 Chance cards

Name: Linkeballen: Team Expansion
Description:
With this extension you get 2 extra teams of three riders.
This makes it possible to play the game to 6 players.

Furthermore you get additional Linkebal cards that affect your entire team. You have the basic game needed for this expansion.

24 team chance cards

Name: Pictionary Air: Kids vs. Grown-ups
Description:
This new version of Pictionary Air is a head-to-head battle of kids vs. grown-ups!

This new design allows the younger kids to have an easier time drawing in the air.  The clue cards for kids now have pictures on them as well as words, to give them a visual reference for their drawing.  In addition, every clue on each card for kids is worth two points, whereas only the last clue on each card for grown-ups is worth two points (all others are worth one point).

There are also new, updated clue cards for grown-ups as well.

Name: Rules Pack 1: Battle Events – New Rules for Five Leagues from the Borderlands
Description:
This expansion pack adds in-battle random events to your games of Five Leagues From the Borderlands.

Applicable to pretty much any campaign, the pack includes 20 random events that can happen during battles, as well as options to tailor the frequency.

Examples include a mysterious scholar wandering the battle field and the battle turning into a three way fight, as well as simpler fare like finding a shiny coin or a deathly fog descending on the battle field.

This is a supplement for Five Leagues From the Borderland 2nd edition and requires the core rules to play.

—description from the publisher
Families: Series: Five Leagues From the Borderland

Name: The Big Lockdown
Description:
The Big Lockdown is a tongue-in-cheek card game inspired by people’s experiences whilst in Lockdown during the global pandemic. The game is filled with references to life in lockdown including toilet paper hoarding, home schooling, and work meetings conducted from the toilet.

The aim is to build your stockpile of supplies whilst avoiding infection.

Deciding which of two decks to draw from lets you decide the risks you're going to take. Winning the game is the about balancing these dangers: do you stay at home, safely consuming supplies, or will you venture into the daunting outdoors to build your stockpile?

Players can collect cards that gain them supplies, allow them to loot other from other players and give them a chance to force other players into risky positions.

A fun and funny game for the whole family to enjoy.

—description from the designer

Name: We Have a Problem, Mr. President
Description:
The only job tougher than being President is being the ADVISOR to the President. Recommend the right moves, the Prez gets the glory. Mess up, and you’ll be put to bed with a shovel. Only the best, brightest, and--yes--those who catch a few breaks survive to enjoy the perks of the work. “We Have a Problem, Mr. President” puts you on the hot seat in the Situation Room as a National Emergency unfolds. It’ll be your job to juggle resources, prioritize problem-solving, and wring out maximum wallop from every ounce of your available political capital as the days tick by and the crisis escalates. Get the country through this, and you WILL be rewarded--maybe even snag a lucrative book deal. Come up short, though, and you’re bureaucratic rubbish--eagerly jettisoned and quickly forgotten.

In this game, you are put in charge of implementing policy decisions for the president during a national emergency. Your goal is to successfully navigate the crisis by dismissing various problems in an escalating pressure cooker environment. During your turn, you will reveal a potential crisis situation and then use dice and your political capital to try and handle the situation. After you come up with a gameplan you still have to get the presidents' approval or it's a no go. If the problem is not solved it carries over and you will lose status. Lose too much and you'll be looking for another place of employment.

—description from the publisher

Name: Finding Anastasia
Description:
THE STORY
In the year 1918 the Russian people revolted against the Monarchy. It was believed that the royal family was eliminated. However, a rumor claims that the Czar’s favorite daughter, Anastasia, survived and has been in hiding from those that are pursuing her. Her Grandmother, the Empress Dowager, heard the rumors and decided to make it her mission to find Anastasia. After years of searching, the Empress invited those who claim to be or know Anastasia to a party, where the Empress hopes to learn enough to find Anastasia.

GAME OVERVIEW
One player is the Empress, while the rest of the players are guests. To find Anastasia, the Empress and her guests must ask questions of each other. The responses are marked on a central board for all players to see. By listening to the answers and exchanging hidden clue cards with each other players must deduce who is and isn’t Anastasia. As questions are answered, gems are given to players. The gems can be used on a player’s turn to perform actions such as gaining clues, revealing roles, or asking additional questions.

The game continues until Anastasia is found or a role ability causes the game to end. Will the Empress find Anastasia? Will Rasputin's Agent find Anastasia first? What other guests will show up to this party? Play Finding Anastasia to find out.

—description from the designer

Name: Credo
Description:
Credo was a board used for playing a variety of different abstract games, primarily two-player games adapted for three players although two-handed versions could be played on it as well.

The board came with a booklet which in addition to Chess gave rules for many Draughts/Checkers variants, Nine Men's Morris, Reversi/Othello, Chinese Checkers, Halma, and other games.

Name: Wizard Tournament
Description:
Ð¢ÑƒÑ€Ð½Ð¸Ñ€ Ð’Ð¾Ð»ÑˆÐµÐ±Ð½Ð¸ÐºÐ¾Ð² ("Wizard Tournament") is a fast-paced spell-shouting game of reaction in which players take on the roles of young wizards swinging their wands, casting spells, summoning magic crystals, and protecting themselves from the Dark Lord.
Each player starts the game with a magic wand, 5 crystals of one color of their choosing, and 1 crystal of each color that was not chosen for the game. 
The game is played over a series of rounds. Each round, 2 dice are rolled. Die sides correspond to the colors of the magic crystals. Additionally, one die contains a white side and another die contains a black side. 
Different combinations make different players cast certain spells (Attackus, Defendus, Captus, or Iamsafus), and whoever is the first to do it right either protects their crystals or gets a chance to take one from the opponent — or even steal some from the Dark Lord himself!
Whenever one of the players has the majority in three crystal colors and doesn’t have the Dark Lord’s mark on them, the game is over and that player is declared the winner!
Count fast, be sure enough to cast your spells with a steady hand, and don’t let other wizards get ahead of you!

—description from the publisher

Name: Monopoly: Grand Bordeaux
Description:
A large part is devoted to Bordeaux itself, but other properties are located around the city.

Brown
Saint Michel (Bordeaux)
Cours Victor Hugo (Bordeaux)

Light Blue
Rue Sainte-Catherine (Bordeaux)
Les Chartrons (Bordeaux)
Cours du Chapeau-Rouge (Bordeaux)

Purple
Place des Quinconces (Bordeaux)
Place de la Bourse (Bordeaux)
Place des Grands Hommes (Bordeaux)

Orange
Eco-quartier Ginko (Bordeaux)
La Rivière
Portets

Red
Cadillac
Route du Médoc (Bordeaux)
Podensac

Yellow
Place de la Victoire
Place Gambetta

Green
Rue du Parlement Sainte-Catherine (Bordeaux)
Place du Parlement (Bordeaux)
Rue du Parlement Sainte-Catherine (Bordeaux)

Blue
Rue Montesquieu (Bordeaux)
Place de la Comédie (Bordeaux)

Stations
Les vélos Vcub
Gare Saint-Jean
Réseau TBC
Aéroport de Bordeaux

Name: Grimdark Future: Firefight Starter Set – Assault on Outpost Lixus
Description:
Grimdark Future: Firefight is a miniature wargame set in a war-torn sci-fi future, which is played using 28mm miniatures. 
The game mechanics are designed to be easy to learn but hard to master, bringing engaging sci-fi battles for new and experienced players alike.

This starter set gives you everything you need to start playing exciting battles right away, without having to worry about painting miniatures or putting together your own army lists. 
With game rules that fit on a single page, you'll be able to learn them quickly and start playing in no time!

The Assault on Outpost Lixus Starter Set contains all of the following:

     Core Game Rules
     Unit Stat Cards (10 Cards)
     Battle Sisters Army (8 Miniatures)
         Heroes: High Sister
         Troops: Battle Sisters, Fanatic Sisters
         Upgrades: Heavy Flamethrower, Fusion Rifle
    
     Alien Hives Army (8 Miniatures)
         Heroes: Snatcher Veteran
         Troops: Assault Grunts, Shooter Grunts, Soul-Snatcher, Hive Warrior
    
      Terrain Pack (11 Terrain Pieces)
         Small: Fields, Crates & Barrels, Barricades
         Large: Forests, Ruins
    
     Play Tokens (106 Tokens)
         Objectives, Activations, Wounds, Pinning
         Magic, Suppression, Fatigue, Danger
    


—description from the publisher

Name: Кубическая рыбалка (Dice Fishing)
Description:
ÐšÑƒÐ±Ð¸Ñ‡ÐµÑÐºÐ°Ñ Ñ€Ñ‹Ð±Ð°Ð»ÐºÐ° ("Dice Fishing") is a fast-paced and exciting dice-rolling game that feels a lot like real fishing! 
Each round, the players take turns rolling 6 custom Bait dice.
There is a common row of Fish cards that is replenished after each player’s turn. Each card requires a certain set of bait to be placed on it. If all slots of the card are filled, the fish starts biting! The players can guess which of the 7 fish types they are about to catch — zander, trout, perch, pike, sturgeon, salmon, or ide — but they won’t know for sure until they flip the card and see it! 
The larger the fish, the harder it is to catch it. Moreover, every fish might get away! In order to increase your chances, you will be mastering your fishing skills by resolving different Opportunity cards that will allow manipulating your rolls and the assortment of fish.
During the game, the players score additional Achievement tokens for different sets of their fish and as soon as anyone collects 7 different fish, they score the endgame Achievement token. After the final scoring, whoever has the most VP wins!

—description from the publisher

Name: Bogus Survival
Description:
Bogus Survival invites players to use story-telling to escape weird and wacky scenarios. You can find yourself stuck on a marooned island, chased by a line of shopping carts, or even blackmailed by Winnie the Pooh. In each case, players will need to get creative to get out.

A game starts by splitting teams into equal survival skill. By using tool cards to create a cohesive escape narrative, the guessing team's survivalist gives clues to his team about which scenario card they are escaping. The opposing team, having selected the card, eagerly hopes they guess wrong.

Guess the scenario card correctly and the survivalist and their team are awarded the survival card. But guess wrong, and the point goes to the opposing team.

There's no time for bickering or second chances: the first team to 3 survival cards wins.

—description from the designer

Name: SuperTmatik Quiz Benfica
Description:
SuperTmatik Quiz Benfica, a test of knowledge on Benfica's athletes, titles, historical facts, curiosities and much more. 
Each card contains questions of different levels and a letter (S U P E R T).
Each player tries to answer questions faster than his opponent(s).
The first player to complete the "SUPERT" before his opponent(s) wins.

Each deck includes 54 cards; 378 questions and their answers; 4 degrees of difficulty. Instructions in Portuguese

SuperTmatik Quiz Benfica, um verdadeiro teste aos seus conhecimentos sobre o Glorioso (atletas, títulos, factos históricos, curiosidades e muito mais). Cada baralho inclui 54 cartas; 378 perguntas e respectivas respostas; 4 graus de dificuldade. Instruções em Português

Name: Sebasto
Description:
Similar to 3’s, but with special dice labeled 0-4 and a special symbol for the 6th value.

Players roll all 6 dice saving at least one die and rerolling the remaining dice until they are satisfied or all 6 rolls are finished. If the special symbol gets rolled and saved, the value of the dice get multiplied by two for every special symbol rolled. Players who accumulate 101 points are eliminated. Rolling a six of a kind wins the game. Whoever has the lowest score after 10 rounds is the winner of the game.

Game Includes: 6 Sebasto Dice, Score Pad, Pencil and Game Rules.

Name: Mr. Lobo's Monster Match Game
Description:
YOU ARE INVITED! In the spooky Chestburster Mansion, Horror Host Mr. Lobo throws a party for Misunderstood Monsters to Mix and Mingle! Of course, Frankenstein, Dracula, Werewolf and Mummy get lucky, find their matches, and leave ealry. The B-Grade ghouls like Robot Monster, Phantom of Krankor and Gappa the Trifibian Giant even end up paring off! Soon, all the "Kool Kreatures" are gone... WILL YOU BE STUCK WITH MR. LOBO??

—description from the designer

All cards are shuffled and the deck is dealt out face down to each player.  Players match all the cards that look alike in their hand and discard face up.  Player to the left of Dealer draws one random card from the dealer's hand.  If it matches one of the cards in their hand, they discard the pair on the table.  Then they offer their cards to the player on their left, who draws a random card, and so on.  Play continues until all pairs have been matched up and discarded.  The player left with the "Mr. Lobo" card in their hand is the loser of the game and is laughed at!  Then, awkward silence.  Reshuffle and repeat!

—user summary

Name: Trial by Trolley: R-Rated Track Expansion
Description:
In Trial by Trolley, one player acts as the Trolley Operator and must choose where to send a murderous, out of control, trolley. Every other player at the table plays cards and argues in order to convince the operator to spare their lives and condemn everyone on the other track to a gruesome death-by-trolley.

This dirty expansion for Trial by Trolley adds 100 extremely R-Rated tracks for you to hit with a trolley. There’s a lot of really bad stuff in here. You’ve been warned!

Name: Trial by Trolley: R-Rated Modifier Expansion
Description:
In Trial by Trolley, one player acts as the Trolley Operator and must choose where to send a murderous, out of control, trolley. Every other player at the table plays cards and argues in order to convince the operator to spare their lives and condemn everyone on the other track to a gruesome death-by-trolley.

This dirty expansion for Trial by Trolley adds 100 awful R-Rated modifiers to spice up your trolley murders. There’s a lot of really bad stuff in here. You’ve been warned!

Name: Choss
Description:
Tac-Tile Choss is Japanese dialect which is used at Hokkaido, Aomori and other north areas of Japan. It means touch, feel or finger.

"Choss" is a matching game with shapes and colors playable using only your sense of touch, sight is not required. Everyone, whether they are sighted or sight impaired, can enjoy playing together with equal footing.

Close your eyes, play the game and have fun conversation with everyone through the game.

The touch based components
There are 25 Tac-Tile tile pieces in the game.  There are only 4 colors, pink, white, black, blue.  But to help distinguish between the colors each color has a different touch pattern on the tile piece.  e.g. the pink tile has 2 gems which protrude like braille, and the blue tiles have 3. Each Tac-Tile is enclosed in a wooden cap, and is played on a wooden board with indents to fit each cap.

How to Play:
All the pieces are placed face-down in the middle of the table. 
On a player's turn they draw a piece and try to match it with any they have in their hand.  
If they get a match they can reveal it or wait until they get a better match.

How to win
Points are award to matching the same shaped tiles, or bonus points are award if the shape and colors match.
If they match 3 different shapes of the same color they can earn the most points.

Name: Trivial Pursuit: Édition Rhône-Alpes
Description:
Discover or rediscover the region of  Rhône-Alpes in 1800 questions by playing with the new Trivial Pursuit rules which will allow you to win a marker triangle on all the squares of the board.

Content: 1 board, 300 question-answer cards, 2 card boxes, 1 die, 6 pie charts, 36 colored marker triangles.

Name: Trivial Pursuit: Édition Nord-Pas-de-Calais
Description:
Discover or rediscover the region Nord Pas-de-Calais in 1800 questions by playing with the new Trivial Pursuit rules which will allow you to win a marker triangle on all the squares of the board.

Content: 1 board, 300 question-answer cards, 2 card boxes, 1 die, 6 pie charts, 36 colored marker triangles.

Name: Trivial Pursuit: Édition Ile-de-France
Description:
Trivial Pursuit: Édition Ile-de-France
Discover or rediscover the region Ile-de-France in 1800 questions by playing with the new Trivial Pursuit rules which will allow you to win a marker triangle on all the squares of the board.

Name: Trivial Pursuit: Édition Bretagne
Description: Discover or rediscover the region of Brittany in 1800 questions by playing with the new Trivial Pursuit rules which will allow you to win a marker triangle on all the squares of the board.

Name: Trivial Pursuit: Édition Gastronomie
Description:
Awaken your taste buds with this new edition of the special Gastronomy Trivial Pursuit! 
1800 questions and answers around the kitchen spread over all categories: Geography, Entertainment, History, Art & Literature, Science and Nature…. 
And surprises

Content: 1 board, 300 question-answer cards, 2 card boxes, 1 die, 6 pie charts, 36 colored marker triangles.

Name: Trivial Pursuit: Édition des Vins
Description:
Impress your friends by answering questions on the geography of wines, the history of wine or the terroirs and grape varieties.

Content: 1 board, 300 question-answer cards, 2 card boxes, 1 die, 6 pie charts, 36 colored marker triangles.

Name: Century: A New World – G1/H1 Location Board
Description:
This mini expansion is compatible with Century: A New World base scenario only.

Game Setup: During Step 1 of the Game Setup, create the game board by using either face of Location board G1/H1 instead of D1, E1, or F1.  Follow the rest of the setup normally.

Actions:
New Trade Locations - first, perform the trade shown in the center of the location as many times as you like (at least once). Then take another turn immediately.

New refresh Fort location - Remove all four face-up point cards displayed above each Fort location and place them face down at the bottom of the Point cards draw deck. Then draw 4 new Point cards from the draw deck and place one of them above each of the Fort locations. Then take another turn immediately.

Available from the Dice Tower 2020 Kickstarter Campaign as part of the Builders Pack.

Name: Zombies!!!: Social Distancing Promo Card
Description:
Text says:
Target player cannot share a tile with another player until the end of their next turn. if currently on a tile with another, must use all movement to move the shortest distance off the tile.

Part of the Dice Tower 2020 Kickstarter campaign (Adventurers Pack).

Name: PARTYtura
Description:
PARTYtura is a game for 3-10 players in which the conductor is to lead an orchestra of the remaining players. In order to meet the expectations of the audience, everyone must maintain the right tempo and understand well the gestures of the conductor. Interestingly, the game will take place in silence - the music is realized in it by playing appropriate cards. Depending on the variant and the number of players, it is a cooperative or team game.

—description from the publisher (translated)

PARTYtura to gra dla 3-10 graczy, w której rolÄ… dyrygenta jest, aby pokierowaÄ‡ orkiestrÄ… zÅ‚oÅ¼onÄ… z pozostaÅ‚ych graczy.
Aby sprostaÄ‡ oczekiwaniom sÅ‚uchaczy, wszyscy muszÄ… utrzymaÄ‡ wÅ‚aÅ›ciwe tempo i dobrze rozumieÄ‡ gesty prowadzÄ…cego.
Co ciekawe, gra odbywaÄ‡ siÄ™ bÄ™dzie w ciszy – muzyka jest w niej realizowana poprzez zagrywanie odpowiednich kart.
W zaleÅ¼noÅ›ci od wariantu i liczby graczy, jest to gra kooperacyjna lub druÅ¼ynowa.

—description from the publisher

Name: Tezamen
Description: Tezamen is a special two-player strategy game in which luck also plays a role.  However, as with life in general, you also need to be able to live with luck.  The successful player constantly adapts to the situations that arise and thus tries to make the best decisions.  In the throne room, the bodyguards protecting the king and the rebels face each other.  The former want to evacuate the ruler, while the latter aim to capture him.

Name: Süniálom
Description:
Autumn has arrived, the hedgehog family is preparing for a winter dream. Hedgehog diligently collects the autumn leaves to line the soft nook under the bushes. Help him collect as many leaves as possible!

Players roll the die to collect 1,2, or 3 leaves from the tree.  But don't roll the wind or all your leaves will be blown away.

Which player will be the most skillful? Who manages to get more leaves and put them on your hedgehog? Fun family board game - not just for preschoolers.

Name: Selfie Crasher
Description:
The Selfie Crasher, or “Self-Crasher,” are alien beings from another star system who like to spoil the self-portrait of the Earthlings. All this by radiating ourselves into the image exactly when you press the shutter button. Sometimes we even clone ourselves to be on a picture multiple times. Count how many times we are seen on different selfies ahead of each other!

Your goal in the game is to get the most self-destruct cards with accurate counting and quick reaction.

Name: BrainBox: World Traveller
Description:
Which part of the world do you want to be in? BrainBox World Traveler is a board game that visits all continents while introducing you to countless celebrations, events and natural formations.
From the uninhabited areas of Australia, through the Amazon rainforest, through the Egyptian pyramids, to the pink sands of Bermuda, you can explore the World with this amazing game.

The object of the game is to make as much information as possible in 10 seconds about the location on the drawn card.
Did you observe and memorize everything well? Then roll the dice and answer the question by the number thrown out correctly. But don’t waste your time because the eyes on the hourglass will fly off quickly! You can check the answers on the card.
If you’re a good observer and already know the places of interest in the world well, most cards will land with you!

World travelers, can we go? No passport required!

Name: Kutyavilág kártyajáték
Description:
A dog tactical card game in which a lot depends on luck and sometimes you can spot players in a really heartless way.
As long as you moor your dog with a leash, you can cheat your teammate’s most valuable dog. Have the strongest deck of cards and you have a win. Exciting, varied board game full of cute dogs, labrador, fox, boxer and poodle.

You just don't want to go out with the dog because it's raining or the wind is raging? You know that can't be an obstacle for a real owner? But even if there’s no urge to take your kennel for a walk at this moment, you can still play a good one with your friends or family with the Dog World card. Grab your imaginary leash, then get started! The winner will be the one who collects the most reward points.

Name: Solar City: Serce Miasta
Description:
Powerful Corporations have started their fight for influence over the city. Solar Revolution, noble idea that once gathered mightiest minds fighting for common goal – the restoration of the environment, turned to a cruel fight for profits. Merciles lobbying from the developers interested only in most valuable plots of land for their majestic skyscrapers brings with it its first victims.

Heart of the City is a first expansion for Solar City. Inside, you’ll find 6 new building types. Every one of them introduces interaction between players. Invest in others’ real estate, gain influence over your opponent’s city or activate your districts gathering tax from other players. You’ll find this and much more in the heart of the city, where fight for influence took entirely new appearance! Buildings from the expansion can be freely mixed with buildings from the core game.

—description from the publisher

Name: Solar City: Suburbia
Description:
The city grows, encroaching upon regions that not long ago were Green and unblemished by bulldozers’ tracks. Newly constructed skyscrapers tower upon long abandoned single story houses, inhabitants of which long since gone to friendlier places or died due to one of the numerous illnesses brought by civilization.

Suburbs is a second expansion for Solar City. Here you’ll find 6 completely new building types, introducing solutions revolutionizing how buildings work and gaining profits from developer investments. Every investment here is inherently linked with financial risk and the expansion itself introduces some degree of randomness concerning building activation. Daring construction plans allow you to copy effects of other buildings and even profit from activation of other districts! See what risky investments in Solar City can earn you! Buildings from the expansion can be freely mixed with buildings from the core game.

—description from the publisher

Name: Chirpee
Description:
Chirpee is a matching card game for kids of all ages. It has super simple rules, perky illustrations, and a short game play time.  54 full color cards for 2 to 8 players ages 8 and up.  It takes between 10 to twenty minutes to play.
On a players turn they will try to match something about the active card and a card in their hand. There are a variety of things that can be matched, the bird itself can be matched as well as the presence of a sword, shield, flag, head gear, and bow. Once a match can be made the player places their match on top of the active card creating a new active card. The winner is the player that empties their hand first.

—description from the publisher

Name: Vendée Globe: Le Jeu de Société
Description:
Vendée Globe - Set off on your monohull and circumnavigate the world in the pure Vendée Globe tradition, solo, non-stop and without assistance, but staying at home. Sail the Atlantic, the Indian and the Pacific, with friends or family, thanks to the official Vendée Globe board game.

Aficionados or beginners, to overcome this ordeal, you will need to avoid OFNIS / UFO (unidentified floating objects), ration your food and answer questions of different levels of difficulty.

Take weather options and make the right choice of sails to beat your competition.

Your sailboat race around the world by progressing on spaces. On each space, an action is requested. It may be to answer a Quiz question or undergo an event.

2 to 6 skippers can line up at the start and freshwater sailors are welcome from 7 years old.

Rest assured, you don't need to spend 78 days at sea to win, since a board tour takes between 30 and 45 minutes.


     1 game box.
     1 game board.
     132 playing cards.
     1 board with parts to detach and assemble: 
         3 movable parts, 
         2 card shoes (Quiz and Event), 
         Sponsor cards + Sails + food tokens.
    
     1 ruleset
     1 bag (containg a needle, 6 game pawn bases, 3 shielded ties)

Name: 18CH: Chilean Railways
Description:
18CH is a railroad-building and investment game set in the country of Chile, in South America. 18CH is a game in a series of loosely-related games collectively known as 18xx games, originated by Francis Tresham with 1829.

18CH features a government railroad — The Empresa de los Ferrocarriles del Estado Railway (EFE) — a long narrow map, and five small narrow-gauge railways called "nitrate corporations", which were built to connect the mines with these resources to major Chilean ports.

Name: Pays de Cornouaille: le Jeu !
Description:
Pays de Cornouaille le Jeu !

is an original, local and user-friendly board game based on the principle of questions and answers. 
Nearly 1000 written and visual questions including 100 "junior" questions which deal with subjects as varied as History or geography, heritage, local traditions, current events or famous people who have marked the Pays de Cornouaille.

Questions relating to all the municipalities in the territory:

     Haut Pays Bigouden: Pouldreuzic, Gourlizon, Guiler-sur-Goyen, Landudec, Peumerit, Plogastel-Saint-Germain, Plonéour-Lanvern, Plovan, Plozévet, Tréogat
     Pays Bigouden Sud: Combrit, Le Guilvinec, Île-Tudy, Loctudy, Penmarc'h, Plobannalec-Lesconil, Plomeur, Pont-l'Abbé, Saint-Jean-Trolimon, Treffiagat, Tréguennec, Tréméoc
     Quimper Community: Ergué-Gabéric, Guengat, Plogonnec, Plomelin, Plonéis, Pluguffan, Quimper
     Fouesnantais country: Bénodet, Clohars-Fouesnant, La Forêt-Fouesnant, Fouesnant, Gouesnac'h, Pleuven, Saint-Evarzec
     Pays de Châteaulin Porzay: Cast, Châteaulin, Dinéault, Ploéven, Plomodiern, Plonévez-Porzay, Port-Launay, Quéménéven, Saint-Coulitz, Saint-Nic, Trégarvan
     Glazik country: Briec, Edern, Landrévarzec, Landudal, Langolen,
     Cap Sizun: Audierne, Beuzec-Cap-Sizun, Cléden-Cap-Sizun, Confort-Meilars, Esquibien, Goulien, Mahalon, Plogoff, Plouhinec, Pont-Croix, Primelin.
     Pays de Douarnenez: Douarnenez, Poullan sur mer, Pouldergat, Le Juch, Kerlaz
     Pays de Quimperlé: Arzano Bannalec, Baye, Clohars-Carnoët, Guilligomarc'h, Locunolé, Mellac, Moëlan-sur-Mer, Querrien, Quimperlé, Rédené, Riec-sur-Belon, Saint-Thurien, Scaër, Tréméven, Le Trévoux
     Pays de Concarneau Cornouaille: Concarneau, Elliant, Melgven, Nevez, Pont-Aven, Rosporden, Saint-Yvi, Tourc'h, Trégunc
     + the municipalities of Locronan and Ile de Sein

Name: Vendée Cube
Description:
Vendée Cube is a game that will allow you to (re)discover the Vendée while having fun. Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the Vendée.

400 questions to have fun and learn all about the Vendée.

A course of 52 spaces to discover the Vendée through a fun quiz.

Content:
100 cards  
4 pawns  
1 board  
1 die

Name: The Eldritch Mines
Description:
It’s the 1920s. You are a private investigator and you’ve been hot on the trail of a local cult looking to awaken a great Elder Demon. You’ve tracked them to an abandoned mine outside of town. You’ll need to act quickly if you want to stop the horrific ritual and close the gate to the Elder Realm before the demon comes through.

The Eldritch Mines is a single page Roll + Write RPG using the Delve12 system - a simplistic game system that utilizes a 12 Sided Dice.

—description from the publisher

Name: StarDriven: Saga
Description:
StarDriven: Saga is the story of a plucky crew lost in an uncharted galaxy, a crew that is barely surviving after losing most of their resources when their ship crashed on a harsh world. This crew of smugglers and misfits must band together to repair the ship and discover new worlds amongst the stars before they run out of supplies. Crew members will spend time aboard the ship and visit planets to unravel the mysteries of the galaxy and find their way home.

StarDriven Saga is a 1-6 player co-operative, science fiction adventure that features eight crew classes that can be combined with different alien species to create a variety of unique characters. The game's campaign features branching storylines and a multitude of worlds and star systems to discover.

—description from the designer

Name: Going Concern
Description:
Going Concern is a small box economic game, featuring an Art Deco artwork theme, focused on risk taking and risk management to accumulate wealth.

Play is divided into 12 rounds, each comprised of 2 phases. The first (Concerns Phase) offers opportunities to expand your business empire by purchasing assets (Manufacturing, Real Estate, Commodities) and earning payouts. In the second (Risk Phase), players encounter one-time effects, which either result in losing some of your Concerns, or receiving additional payouts.

Players manage risk through the purchase of craft politicians in the Concerns Phase, which limit downside in the Risk Phase, and through diversification.

—description from the publisher

Name: Project L: Finesse Ambassador Pack
Description:
A Kickstarter exclusive promo that adds an extra set of Finesse tiles with advanced gameplay mechanisms.

This promo requires the Finesse expansion.

Name: Bordeaux Cube
Description:
Bordeaux in 400 questions!

Here is a game that allows you to (re)discover Bordeaux while having fun. Cuisine, geography, heritage, history:

     4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the region.
     400 multiple choice questions written by a specialist to play with family or friends.
     A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice and playing cards that you can take with you everywhere.

Name: Le fort Boyard Cube Quizz
Description:
Le fort Boyard Cube Quizz is a game that will allow you to (re)discover the Fort while having fun.

400 questions about Fort Boyard!

Multiple choice questions written by specialists to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 die and playing cards that you can take with you everywhere!

Name: Le Grisbi
Description:
Le Grisbi is a friendly, family-friendly card game whose references immerse you in the world of French cinema, each game combining luck and strategy!

With easy intergenerational references, anyone can play.

And why not end up watching the films mentioned together? But the winner chooses!

1 deck of 53 cards will allow up to 5 players to play,
2 decks, up to 9
etc...

Le Grisbi is made up of 53 game cards and 3 double-sided rule cards.
The 53 cards in the game are divided into 2 categories:

     40 numbered cards (4 series of cards ranging from 1 to 10)
     13 special cards (with super powers)


Game play:

Each player starts with 3 cards face down in front of them covered with 3 cards face up and 3 cards in their hand. The rest of the cards serve as a draw pile.

The first player begins by putting on the table one or more cards of the same value located in her hand. At this point she must draw the number of cards sufficient to have at least three cards in her hand. The next player must put one or more cards of equal or greater value than the previous number card and draw accordingly and so on. If he cannot play or if tactically he finds it more interesting, the player recovers the game pile and starts a new pile. As long as there is a draw pile all players must have at least 3 cards in hand. Otherwise a player can say "Grisbi" and designate the person who does not have 3 cards in hand and this person will have to recover the game pile. The player who said "Grisbi" starts playing again.

Once the draw is completed, players play all the cards they have in their hand. When it is done, the player can recover his new deck by taking the cards face up located in front of him. He plays as before until he has no more cards.
 Then, on the third phase, the player, when it is his turn, turns over a card face down at random and places it on the pile. If the played card remains in the rule, the game continues and it is up to the next player. If the placed card does not respect the rule, the player takes the playing pile back into hand and must get rid of it before moving on to the next face down card.

The first to get rid of all his cards wins and the game ends when there is only one player left.

Name: Good Cop Bad Cop: Promotion Pack #1
Description:
This is a promo pack given to backers of the Good Cop Bad Cop: Promoted Kickstarter campaign. It contains:
 * Matchmaker
 * Medium
 * Mustache Maker
 * Party Planner

Name: Anjou Cube
Description:
Anjou Cube is a game that will allow you to (re)discover Anjou while having fun. 
Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in Anjou.
400 questions on the culture of Anjou!
Multiple choice questions written by two specialists to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 die and playing cards that you can take with you everywhere!

Name: Dragamonz
Description:
Are YOU ready to throw down with some of the bravest, silliest, and most epic creatures you’ve ever seen? Good! Get ready to smash, collect, and battle with 'Dragamonz, the newest collectible and trading card game!

Smash open an egg to reveal the half-animal, half-dragon figure inside and collect up to 72 different characters. Each character comes with trading cards that can be used in a battling card game for further extended play.

Each turn you select one of your Dragamonz and choose which of your oponnent's Dragamonz you want to face.  You then both draw two cards from your custom selected deck belong to each dragamonz.  Flip the cards to see who wins.

Quick, easy entry level TCG that can be a great entry level game to teach young players deck construction.

—description from the publisher

Name: Bassin d'Arcachon Cube
Description:
The Arcachon Basin in 400 questions!

This game allows you to (re)discover the Arcachon Basin while having fun. Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the region.

400 multiple choice questions to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice and playing cards that you can take everywhere with you!

Name: Berry Cube
Description:
Berry Cube is a game that will allow you to (re)discover Berry while having fun. 
Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the region.

400 questions on the culture of Berry!

Multiple choice questions written by a specialist to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 die and 100 playing cards that you can take with you everywhere!

Name: Bretagne Cube
Description:
In Bretagne cube, multiple choice questions on 4 themes: cuisine, geography, heritage, history. 
Each of them is symbolized by a color, to be unbeatable on the region.

400 questions on Breton culture!

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice and 100 playing cards that you can take everywhere with you!

Name: Béarn Cube
Description:
Béarn cube game allows you to (re)discover the Béarn while having fun. 
Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the region.

400 multiple choice questions about the culture of Béarn at different difficulty levels.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice and playing cards that you can take everywhere with you!

Name: Charente Cube
Description:
With Charente Cube (re)discover the Charente department while having fun: cooking, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the department.

400 multiple choice questions to play with family and friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice, and 100 playing cards that you can take everywhere with you!

Name: Charente-Maritime Cube
Description:
Charente-Maritime Cube is a game that will allow you to (re) discover Charente-Maritime while having fun. 
Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the department.

400 questions on the culture of Charente-Maritime to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 die and playing cards that you can take with you everywhere!

Name: La Vendée qui gagne Cube
Description:
Thanks to La Vendée qui gagne Cube containing 400 questions on the "Maritime Vendée", players will be able to (re)discover legendary skippers, Vendée around the world and by sail, the vocabulary of boating. 
Each theme is symbolized by a color, to be unbeatable on the subject.

Multiple choice questions to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice and playing cards that you can take everywhere with you!

Name: Landes Cube
Description:
Landes Cube game allows you to (re)discover the Landes while having fun.

Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the department.

400 multiple choice questions to play with family or friends, at different levels of difficulty.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice and 100 playing cards that you can take everywhere with you!

Name: Murder Mystery Party: Murder at the Manor
Description:
Not the same game as Flexi Party.  This game long pre-dates Flexi.

Who killed John Paul Gettisjust Desserts?
The time is the present. (Note, this game is from circa late 1980s).  The place is the old Manor House. Lord John Paul has invited 12 guests to a gathering at the Manor to discuss with them matters of deadly importance.  But... the evening ended before it had begun when Lord John Paul was found slumped over the kitchen table—was it an accident, or did someone give him his just desserts?

Typical murder mystery party game for 12 suspects (players).

Includes:

12 character clue booklets
    12 invitations & envelopes
    party instructions
    rules of play
    12 name tags
    costume suggestions
    menu suggestions
    accusation sheet
    author's solution
    cassette (recording of the murder)
    2 balloons

Name: Clever Keys
Description:
There’s treasure in the old castle! Players take turns inserting keys into the game board. If the keys are inserted in the right slot, they unlock the secret chamber and reveal valuable gemstones. Every additional move either lets the player get richer – or lose everything. The player who collects the most gemstones wins.

This push-your-luck memory game uses a unique box and board construction to provide hundreds of combinations for the "locked" areas of the board.

-description from publisher

Name: G'Zoink: Expansion 02 – The Pox Aroma
Description:
A New Locale and 10 new Lowdowns.
Including brand new "The Hookup" cards!

The Pox Aroma is the second amazingly awesome expansion for the ridiculously fun and easy to learn G'Zoink game.

—description from the publisher

Name: G'Zoink: Expansion 03 – A Bunch of New Lowdowns
Description:
Add 134% more zaniness to your G'Zonk game with this provocative and astonishing new expansion.

It brings 25 new Lowdown cards (Including Splats, Fixes and Hookups) to the party!

—description from the publisher

Name: G'Zoink: Expansion 3.5 – Chunderstorm
Description:
The Giggities are hitting it hard and passing on their bad habits to you in this exciting obnoxious & obnoxiously exciting expansion to the G'Zoink game.

Get down & Funky! There's an entire locale overflowing with giggities and a hoard of new Lowdown cards.

—description from the publisher

Name: G'Zoink: Expansion 05 – The Incredibly Huge Monster
Description:
The incredibly huge monster is the fifth in a series of sweet new expansions for the astonishingly sensational and easy to learn G'Zoink game.

Provocative new "The Wipe" cards bring alternative end conditions to the G'Zoink game.  How cool is that?

—description from the publisher

Name: G'Zoink: Expansion 04 – That One Place With All The Sand
Description:
That one place with all the sand is the fourth in a series of groovy expansions for the intriguinly thrilling and easy to learn G'Zoink game.

Thanks to this expansion. "The Scoop" cards are now a thing that's a thing.  They introduce alternate win conditions to the G'Zoink game.  Awesome.

—description from the publisher

Name: Cartographers Heroes: Collector's Edition
Description:
The Collector's edition of Cartographers Heroes includes a larger box to hold content from expansions, Map Packs 1-3, a mini card expansion, and colored pencils.

The larger box (318 x 227 x 72 mm - Roll Player sized) has room to store additional Cartographers content (sold separately) from Cartographers: A Roll Player Tale, Map Packs 4-6, and the other 3 mini expansions (Skills 1, Ambush, and Champions).

This product includes:

     All the content from the retail edition of Cartographers Heroes
     Custom plastic insert (supports sleeved cards)
     20 Colored Pencils (4 sets of 5 colors)
     Cartographers: Map Pack 1 â€“ Nebblis: Plane of Flame
     Cartographers: Map Pack 2 â€“ Affril: Plane of Knowledge
     Cartographers: Map Pack 3 â€“ Undercity: Depths of Sabek
     Cartographers: Skills Mini Expansion 2

Name: G'Zoink: Expansion 06 – Even More New Lowdowns
Description:
Things are getting out of control.  How will you contain this much awesomness?  It's almost too much wackiness!

Feast your imagination and back in the envy of your friends with 25 new Lowdown cards (Splats, Fixes, Hookups, Scoops & Wipes)!

—description from the publisher

Name: Super Team
Description:
Super Team is a highly-tactical football game featuring unique deck of cards for each team and captain, containing offensive and defensive tactical moves along with amazing skills to create a fast and exciting match.

On a turn each player simply plays 1-3 cards from their hands, resolving each card’s actions by rolling dice. The number of dice a player can roll for each action relates to that action’s stat set by the player at the start of each half of the game.

Super Team is also a game of resource management: each team gains morale(stars) by performing tactic cards and can spend those stars on critical events such as a perfect pass through, saving a chip shot or simply an extra movement!

—description from the publisher

Name: Monopoly: Coraline
Description:
Fans of Coraline and her “Other”-worldly adventures will feel right at home using tokens such as a Hair Pin, Looking Stone, and more to traverse the board, collecting Mr. Bobinsky, The Cat, and other memorable characters from the haunting stop-motion fantasy film.

—description from the publisher
Families: Versions & Editions: Versions with IP after the original release

Name: Social Responsibility: The Game
Description:
The whole point of the Social Responsibility the card game is to never stop having fun. And that’s just what will happen with this game that you can play over and over again. Incredibly fun, this ethical card game offers multiple ways to win. So you can enjoy the fact that no time playing it will be like the last. Get your friends together and enjoy a card game with a theme of social responsibility. Because who doesn’t want to encourage positive conversations with our loved ones? Mixing strategy, luck, and memory, this interactive game engages you in multiple ways. Plus, it even incorporates mini-games, such as Rock Paper Scissors, that everyone will recognize. You’ll laugh so hard you'll cry with this socially responsible card game, and you may even want to play the optional drinking game!

There are many elements in the game that mean the person winning can change in an instant.

—description from the designer

Name: Island Hunters TCG
Description:
Island Hunters is a trading card game of Monsters, Items, Resources and more! Almost all current cards have an keyword that effects the game in someway.

It is a fun, strategic deck-building game for two, where players use their deck of 60 cards and battle one another. Players race to gain Island Essence in hopes to release their ELITE cards onto the board! Be the first person to destroy the enemy's Health Totem and walk away knowing you can conquer any island.

—description from the designer

Name: Fiefdoms
Description:
A brutal rivalry among the Kingdom’s strongest Fiefs has the King’s Lords on the verge of conflict. The King, corrupt with power and a lust for blood, has demanded a battle to gain his favor. The Lords, unwilling to fester their mighty King, assemble their Knights, Squires and Seige in preparation of pending brutal combat.

Fiefdoms is a frantic, real-time, medieval dice battler that requires quick thinking, dexterity and stamina. As a ruling Lord during a rather volatile medieval time, defend your Fief while gathering stone, mining gold, and destroying your enemy! With only a few but crucial components, Fiefdoms sets up in seconds, plays in minutes and satisfies your quest for domination.

VICTORY
Slay your rival’s Lord or collect 5 Gold Nuggets.

SETUP:
Start the game with 1 Lord and 3 fiefs. Gold Nuggets and Stones are set in the center of the table within reach.

HOW-TO-PLAY:
Roll 2 dice simultaneously and continuously (in real-time) with your rival until you attain victory.


Roll 7’s

MINE GOLD (add 1 Gold Nugget to your side of the table)

or PILLAGE GOLD (remove 1 Gold Nugget from your rival’s side of the table and send it to the center of the table)

or REBUILD FIEF (send 2 Gold Nuggets to the center of the table to add back 1 Fief to your side of the table).

Roll Doubles
MINE STONE (add 1 Stone to your side of the table)

REBUILD FIEF (send 1 Stone to the center of the table to add back 1 Fief from the center of the table to your side of the table) 

or FIRE TREBUCHET (send 1 Stone to the center of the table to remove 1 Fief from your rival’s side of the table and send it to the center of the table)

Or SLAY LORD (if none of your rival’s Fiefs remain, send 1 Stone to the center of the table to remove the Lord from your rival’s side of the table).

FAQ
The table is a neutral zone where unused Fiefs, Stone and Gold Nuggets reside.

You can only add Fiefs of the same color to your side of the table.

-description from publisher

Name: Mit Ach und Krach gibt's doch ein Dach
Description:
It's a rainy day in the woods. The imps (players) take turns to place their tokens onto the game board. The goal is to build a roof by occupying all three spaces that form a red or blue triangle.  If a player completes a roof, he may remove an opponent token from the board. When all tokens are placed, the players move 1 token by one space each turn. To move between red and blue spaces is only possible via the greeen space in the center of the board. Any token moving onto the green space has to leave it next turn.

The first player who has only two tokens left, loses the game.

Name: Puy du Fou: Le Jeu
Description:
Discovering the Puy du Fou with the family is an opportunity for everyone to marvel and immerse themselves in the heart of the greatest eras in History.

The Puy du Fou is a high place where History and legend mingle which sometimes escapes the rules of time. An imbalance has been created.

To restore order, help the heroes find their equipment so they can save history!

—description from the publisher (translated)

Name: Illuminati (Second Edition): 2020
Description:
In Illuminati (Second Edition): 2020, a 26-card expansion for Illuminati (Second Edition), Steve Jackson brings you rules for the spread of COVID-19, opening up and closing down, and all the other things we've seen. Cards include Statue Smashers, Defund the Police, Mask Designers, and, of course, the one that changes everything: #BLACKLIVESMATTER.

—description from the publisher

Name: Premier Arrivé: Le Moyen-âge
Description: Combine battle and strategy and be the first to capture the castle.

Name: Corporate Coffin
Description:
Poor life choices have lead you to a design career within a corporate setting. Now you must survive an entire work day! Make it to your desk, complete a task & get back out the door with as little aggravation as possible.

Game-play is a modern twist on classic race games. Players take turns rolling a die and moving the indicated number of space through the office. The first player to make it to their desk and back out of the office wins.

Throughout their day (game-play) players gain and complete "Shituation" cards. The hilariously soul crushing Shituation cards may compel a player to visit HR, complete a project in the video department, or simply hide out in the snack room. Drawing a Shituaton car is activated by landing on specific map spaces on your journey. Shituations may help or hinder your progress getting in and out of the office.

Corporate Coffin is real, raw and hilariously accurate in its mockery of corporate culture. Think Office Space meets Candyland. Play until someone wins or everyone else quits.

Name: Monopoly: Black Panther
Description:
From the Warrior Falls Challenge Pool, to the Hall of Kings, to the Tribal Council Room in the Golden City, this Edition of the Monopoly game features locations and themes inspired by Marvel's Black Panther. Players can imagine exploring beautiful Wakanda with T'Challa and his people as they move around the board trying to make as many Alliances as they can. Build Villages and Strongholds, and make moves directed by the Kimoyo Beads cards and Heart-shaped Herb cards. The last player with money when all other players have gone bankrupt wins.


     Includes gameboard, 6 tokens, 6 Character cards, 28 Title Deed cards (22 Alliances, 4 Transports, 2 Great Mound spaces), 16 Kimoyo Beads cards, 16 Heart-shaped Herb cards, 32 Villages, 12 Strongholds, 2 dice, Monopoly money pack, and game guide.


Features Marvel's Black Panther theme, locations, and characters

Play as a character's iconic mask, helmet, blade, gauntlet, or spear.

Players move tokens around the board making as many Alliances as they can.

Kimoyo Beads cards and Heart-shaped Herb cards direct players to do tasks such as handing over money or going to Jail.

-description from publisher's website
Families: Versions & Editions: Versions with IP after the original release

Name: Knope for President
Description:
Master the spin and pull your campaign out of the pit with the Knope for President game inspired by the hit series, Parks and Recreation. Pawnee's reporters keep uncovering controversies and players try to defend their reputation to stay in the race. The reporter reads a scandal based on the show, and you choose your best Spin card quote, and really try to sell it. Add your own drama and details so that the reporter will choose yours as the best. And if you're a true Pawnee Insider, you can do it in character. Harness the enthusiasm of Chris Traeger or the passion of Leslie Knope – or whomever you're quoting. The reporter awards the best one a Vote token and the first player to earn 3 tokens wins the nomination…and the game.

PARKS AND RECREATION THEME: It's time to catch your dream and shackle it to your heart as you play this party game inspired by the hit TV show, Parks and Recreation

SPIN THE SCANDALS: The reporter reads a Scandal card and candidates respond with a Spin card. The hilarious and wacky scandals, scenarios, and quotes are all inspired by the Parks and Rec television series

GET VOTE TOKENS WITH THE BEST SPIN: When candidates present their Spin response they can embellish, add drama, or say very little as long as they incorporate the exact character quote on the card

PAWNEE SCANDALS: Candidates respond to headlines from The Pawnee Journal or the Pawnee Sun, a prompt from Ya Heard? With Perd's Perd Hapley, or a citizen write-in

PARTY GAME: Fans of Parks and Rec will love this party game about the pitfalls of politics. It captures the essence of the show's quirky characters and scenarios.

• Includes 300 cards (200 Spin cards, 94 Scandal cards, 6 Leslie Knope's Official Candidate Debate Tips cards), 18 cardboard Vote tokens, and instructions.

—description from the publisher

Name: Super Fantasy Brawl: Force of Nature
Description:
Add to the roster of your Champions with the Force of Nature! This expansion adds Taze, Loralei, and Nevamore to your Champions. Let’s take a look at them! Taze knows what it takes to be a Champion. As one of the few Tauriak born into the warrior caste of his people, Taze was groomed to become a warrior. As battles between clans were decided by a trial of champions, Taze was tutored by the best trainers and armed with the greatest weapons, becoming a living weapon that would bring victory to his clan again and again. Adored by his friends, and feared by his enemies, Taze built his life on triumph after bloody triumph. His was an existence of strength and battle, and Taze would have it no other way.

Through the countless wars that have engulfed history, Fabulosa itself has suffered the most. A world ravaged and torn, eventually nature had to fight back. A dryad of incredible power, Loralei was once the nesting spirit of a druidic grove, her life given to protect that sacred place. With its destruction, she was free to venture into Fabulosa, protecting other groves from the same fate. Appearing wherever she was needed, Loralei kept the world in balance, ensuring that no matter what atrocities the races of Fabulosa committed, life would find a way to survive.

Nevamor’s former life as a druid was cut short by the Droskarian Horde, but whilst death comes for all things, not all things accept death as easily as others. Nevamor’s will to live extended far beyond the mortal coil, and he returned a wraith; the first undead. Although his first act was one of revenge, soon Nevamor became a protector of the lost, an avenging shade that preyed upon those who would prey on others. With his trusted companion Poe, Nevamor would hunt those who would think themselves the hunter and prove them wrong.

—description from the publisher

Name: Limousin Cube
Description:
Limousin Cube is a game that will allow you to (re)discover the Limousin region while having fun. 
Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the region.
400 questions on Limousin culture!
Multiple choice questions written by two specialists to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 die and 100 playing cards that you can take with you everywhere!

Name: Loire-Atlantique Cube
Description:
Loire-Atlantique Cube contains 400 questions about Loire-Atlantique, to (re) discover the region while having fun. 
Cuisine, geography, heritage, history, each theme is symbolized by a color, to be unbeatable in the department. 
Multiple choice questions to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice and 100 playing cards that you can take everywhere with you!

Name: Lot-et-Garonne Cube
Description:
The Lot-et-Garonne in 400 questions!

Thanks to this easy-to-carry game, players will learn more about Lot-et-Garonne.

Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the region, with questions at several levels of difficulty.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice, and 100 playing cards.

Name: Marais Poitevin Cube
Description:
Marais Poitevin Cube is a game that will allow you to (re)discover the Poitevin Marsh while having fun. 
Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the region.

400 questions on the culture of the Marais poitevin!
Multiple choice questions written by a specialist to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 die and 100 playing cards that you can take with you everywhere!

Name: Oléron Cube
Description:
Oléron Cube is a game that allows you to (re)discover Oléron while having fun. Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable on the island.

400 multiple choice questions to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice and 100 playing cards that you can take with you everywhere.

Name: Pays Basque Cube
Description:
With Pays Basque Cube, you will be able to (re)discover the French Basque Country while having fun.

Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable about the region.

400 multiple choice questions written by a specialist, with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice, and 100 playing cards that you can take everywhere with you!

Name: ASL Roma 2020
Description:
ASL Roma 2020 is a map and scenario pack for Advanced Squad Leader produced by MMP and the joint efforts of Federazione Italiana Wargame and ASL Italia for the Rome Wargame Gathering in Rome, Italy, October 2020. The pack contains a new 8" x 22" geomorphic mapboard (86) and four new scenarios by designers Sebastiano Caltabiano, Paolo Cariolato, Ken Dunn, and Pete Shelling with actions featuring Italian, Greek, German, French Partisan, New Zealand, and American forces.

ASL Roma 2020 contains:

     one 8Ë × 22Ë geomorphic mapboard (86)


Four ASL scenarios:

     Roma1 Eight Million Bayonets – 5.5 turns, 2 November 1940, Kalpaki, Greece
     Roma2 Second Hand News – 5 turns, 11 September 1943, Bastia, Corsica
     Roma3 Salarola Junction – 8 turns, 2 December 1943, Salarola, Italy
     Roma4 Mountain Marines – 8 turns, 16 November 1944, Eglio, Italy


Designed for the aficionado, ASL Roma 2020 is not a complete product and assumes the buyer owns the core Advanced Squad Leader game system.

—description from the publisher

Name: Poitou Cube
Description:
Poitou Cube is a game that will allow you to (re)discover Poitou while having fun. 
Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the region.

400 multiple choice questions written by a specialist to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 die and 100 playing cards that you can take with you everywhere!

Name: Périgord Cube
Description:
With the Périgord Cube you will be able to (re)discover Périgord while having fun.

Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable in the region.

400 multiple choice questions written by a specialist, with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 dice, and 100 playing cards that you can take everywhere with you!

Name: Touraine Cube
Description:
Touraine Cube is a game that will allow you to (re)discover the region of Touraine while having fun. 
Cuisine, geography, heritage, history: 4 themes, symbolized by 4 colors, to be unbeatable on Touraine.

400 multiple choice questions written on the culture of Touraine to play with family or friends.

A small box containing a foldable game board, 4 pawns, 1 die and 100 playing cards that you can take with you everywhere!

Name: Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid – Villain Pack #3: Legacy of Evil
Description:
“Evil such as mine cannot be contained forever.” —Thrax

Want some new bosses? Thrax brings a terrifying strength and sorcery to the battle, while Divatox has her own ambitions to conquer Earth. How about some new monsters? Pirantishead will hijack the Zords, Terror Toad will swallow the Rangers whole, and the legendary King Sphinx will blow them all away!

Requires Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid to play.

Features
• Challenge yourself with two new Bosses: Thrax and Divatox!
• Adds three new monsters: Pirantishead, Terror Toad, and King Sphinx!
• Expands the award-winning Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid!

Contents Summary:
• 3 Monster Figures
• 3 Monster Deployment Cards
• 24 Monster Enemy Cards
• 2 Boss Figures
• 2 Boss Deployment Cards 
• 16 Boss Enemy Cards
• Rulesheet
• Replacement Card Pack
Families: Game: Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid

Name: Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid – Squatt & Baboo Character Pack
Description:
“Squatt! Baboo! Where are you two cretins?! I'm furious! Come here so I can berate you!”  â€•Rita Repulsa

Rita Repulsa’s most bumbling buddies have joined the fray. But don’t underestimate these two chuckleheads. Though they lack the sheer strength of Goldar or the creative genius of Finster, they make do with moxie and mayhem! It’s time for Squatt and Baboo to shine!

Requires Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid to play.

Features
• Introduce moxie and mayhem to your game with Squatt & Baboo!
• Both miniatures are large scale and highly detailed!
• Expands the award-winning Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid!

Contents Summary:
• 2 Monster Figures
• 16 Monster Enemy Cards
• 3 Monster Deployment Cards
• Rulesheet
Families: Game: Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid

Name: Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid – Legendary Rangers: Forever Rangers Pack
Description:
"We need Thunderzord power now!" —Tommy Oliver

The Power Rangers have upgraded their Dinozords to the brand-new Thunderzords! Adam Park, Rocky DeSantos, Aisha Campbell, and Kat Hillard have arrived in Angel Grove to take the fight to the next level, and Alpha 5 is ready in the command center to provide some helpful advice to the new Mighty Morphin team. Evil won’t know what hit ’em!

Requires Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid to play.

Features
• Upgrade your Dinozords to Thunderzords!
• Includes all-new combat decks and character sculpts!
• Expands the award-winning Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid!

Contents Summary:
• 5 Ranger Figures
• 5 Character Cards
• 50 Combat Cards 
• 6 Zord Cards
• 2 Megazord Cards
• Rulesheet
Families: Game: Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid

Name: Cow, Tiger, Santa Claus: Alternate Play Rules – High Score
Description:
A promo card for Cow, Tiger, Santa Claus. Requires the base game to play.

In this High Score alternate mode, players wiil try to find as many multiples of the items on the cards as possible, with higher points for the harder cards.

Name: Tag Team: Uptown Jailbirds vs. Downtown Bullies
Description:
These days it's not enough to be the toughest crew on the streets; you need to make sure everyone knows it, too. Bring enough cans of spray paint to tag walls all over town, and enough muscle to make sure no one else does. There's nothing quite as satisfying as watching little punks drop their spray cans and run at the very sight of you — just make sure that there isn't someone even bigger right around the corner!

In Tag Team, you play as a crew of Eagles, Bulldogs, Alligators or Gorillas, defending your turf by bluffing your way through battles each day. Players simultaneously reveal their leader characters, and, if nobody backs down, their backup characters join the fight. The winner tags their opponent's territory as a reward. In the end, the crew with the most tagged territory wins.

Name: Unity: Anti-Tank Weapons of Unified Space – For Renegade Scout 2nd Edition
Description:
Unity: Anti-Tank weapons of Unified Space is the second supplement for Renegade Scout 2nd edition, it expands the range of vehicle and anti-vehicle options available in the game:

     3 new weapon traits (Melt, Guided, Ammo)
     2 new vehicle modifications (Target selector, Deflection field packs)
     4 new weapon systems.
     New ammunition types for mortars, rocket launchers, main guns and auto cannon.
     As well as brief flavor text detailing anti-tank fighting in Unified Space.


The "..of Unified Space" series is intending to be a series of small, bite-sized expansions for Renegade Scout 2nd edition, adding new content and options to the game system, expanding the universe and generally increasing the amount of fun to be had.

—description from the publisher

Name: Invaders from Dimension X!: Harvester of Souls
Description: Expansion from Yaah! Magazine #7 for Invaders from Dimension X! This expansion adds 8 new chits, the Kay'Otz Harvester, the Marine YAAH Gun, and 6 civilian units. It comes with one new scenario that uses Mapzone Alpha.
Families: Series: Invaders from Dimension X! (Tiny Battle Publishing)

Name: Trivial Pursuit: Rhône-Alpes
Description:
The famous trivia game.

The questions are about the French region Rhône-Alpes.

There are 3000 questions in 6 different themes; History, Geographie, Science and Nature, Art and Literature, Entertainment and Sports and Leisure.

Name: Trivial Pursuit: Aquitaine
Description:
The famous trivia game.

The questions are about the French region Aquitaine.

There are 3000 questions in 6 different themes; History, Geographie, Science and Nature, Art and Literature, Entertainment and Sports and Leisure.

Name: Trivial Pursuit: Édition Aquitaine
Description: Discover or rediscover the region of Aquitaine in 1800 questions by playing with the new Trivial Pursuit rules which will allow you to win a marker triangle on all the squares of the board.
